perturbation.original_text:
5.1   ebix shall pay to About, [**] in consideration for the Advertising
Impressions as set forth in Section 4.1  [ADVERTISING IMPRESSIONS; INTEGRATION IMP...], herein, no later than seven (7)
business days from the Effective Date , which shall be paid to About via wire
transfer, pursuant to the following instructions:[**]
perturbation.changed_text:
5.1   ebix shall pay to About, [**] in consideration for the Advertising
Impressions as set forth in Section 4.1  [ADVERTISING IMPRESSIONS; INTEGRATION IMP...], herein, no later than thirty (30)
business days from the Effective Date , which shall be paid to About via wire
transfer, pursuant to the following instructions:[**]
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the payment deadline from seven (7) business days to thirty (30) business days. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty regarding the agreed-upon payment terms, potentially leading to disputes over late fees and breach of contract.

perturbation.original_text:
5.3   If any of the payments are not received on or before the appropriate dates
as described above, About shall have the right to charge ebix interest on
the overdue amount at the rate of 6% per year,, calculated from 30 days
after the end of the month for which payment is made until the date of
ebix's payment of such amount, which interest shall be in addition to such
fees due and owing About.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.3   If any of the payments are not received on or before the appropriate dates
as described above, About shall have the right to charge ebix interest on
the overdue amount at the rate of 12% per year,, calculated from the initial due date until the date of
ebix's payment of such amount, which interest shall be in addition to such
fees due and owing About.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the interest rate charged on overdue payments from 6% to 12% per year and when interest calculation will begin from. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty regarding the penalties for late payments.

perturbation.original_text:
5.2 In addition, ebix agrees to pay to About a fee of [**] for [**] and [**]
from [**] up to [**] (the "Application Fees"). The payment of the Application
Fees are to be due within 30 days after the end of the month in which the
Application Fees were generated. Such payments shall be accompanied by a
report stating the number of Filled Application Forms generated during the
previous month, as well as the amount due to About. Ebix will track the
number of Filled Application Forms generated by About Customers.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.2 In addition, ebix agrees to pay to About a fee of [**] for [**] and [**]
from [**] up to [**] (the "Application Fees"). The payment of the Application
Fees are to be due within 60 days after the end of the quarter in which the
Application Fees were generated. Such payments shall be accompanied by a
report stating the number of Filled Application Forms generated during the
previous quarter, as well as the amount due to About. Ebix will track the
number of Filled Application Forms generated by About Customers.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the payment deadline for the 'Application Fees' from 30 days after the end of the *month* to 60 days after the end of the *quarter*. This creates a discrepancy in the payment schedule, leading to potential confusion and disputes over when payments are actually due.
